
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/code-daily/p/18851097" title="发布于 2025-04-28 10:22">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">.NET 原生驾驭 AI 新基建实战系列（五）：Milvus ── 大规模 AI 应用的向量数据库首选</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 style="align-items: center; background: none center / 63px no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: column; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 2.4em; letter-spacing: 0; border-radius: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: 38px; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: center; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 10px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">1. 引言</span></h2>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Milvus 是一个强大的工具，帮助开发者处理大规模向量数据，尤其是在人工智能和机器学习领域。它可以高效地存储和检索高维向量数据，适合需要快速相似性搜索的场景。在 .NET 环境中，开发者可以通过 Milvus C# SDK 轻松连接和操作 Milvus 服务器，包括创建集合、插入数据和执行搜索等操作。</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>Milvus 是一个开源向量数据库，专为 AI 和 ML 应用设计，支持高效相似性搜索。</li>
<li>它采用云原生架构，分为接入层、协调服务、工作节点和存储四层，便于扩展。</li>
<li>在 .NET 中，可通过 Milvus C# SDK（当前为 2.3.0-preview.1）操作 Milvus，安装简单，功能包括创建集合、插入数据和搜索。</li>
<li>Milvus 在图像检索、推荐系统和 NLP 等场景中表现优异，最新版本为 2.5.9（2025 年 4 月 14 日）。</li>
<li>Milvus 在性能上通常优于其他向量数据库，特别是在大规模数据处理中。</li>
</ul>
<h2 style="align-items: center; background: none center / 63px no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: column; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 2.4em; letter-spacing: 0; border-radius: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: 38px; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: center; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 10px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">2. Milvus 概述</span></h2>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Milvus 是一个在 2019 年创建的开源向量数据库，其主要目标是存储、索引和管理由深度神经网络和其他机器学习（ML）模型生成的大规模嵌入向量。它能够处理万亿级别的向量索引，特别适用于非结构化数据的处理，例如图像、视频、音频和自然语言等，这些数据占全球数据的约 80%。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Milvus 的设计原则是云原生，将存储和计算分离，所有组件均为无状态。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Milvus 支持多种索引和度量，适合不同的应用场景。以下是支持的索引类型及其适用场景：</p>
<table style="display: table; text-align: left">
<thead>
<tr><th style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(240, 240, 240, 1); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; min-width: 85px; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">索引类型</th><th style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(240, 240, 240, 1); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; min-width: 85px; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">分类</th><th style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(240, 240, 240, 1); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; min-width: 85px; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">最佳适用场景</th></tr>
</thead>
<tbody style="font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal; border-image: initial; border: 0">
<tr style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); width: auto; height: auto">
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">FLAT</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">无</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">小规模（百万级）数据集，追求精度</td>
</tr>
<tr style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(248, 248, 248, 1); width: auto; height: auto">
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">IVF_FLAT</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">无</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">平衡精度和查询速度</td>
</tr>
<tr style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); width: auto; height: auto">
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">IVF_SQ8</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">量化-based</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">资源受限，减少内存消耗</td>
</tr>
<tr style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(248, 248, 248, 1); width: auto; height: auto">
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">IVF_PQ</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">量化-based</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">高查询速度，牺牲一定精度</td>
</tr>
<tr style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); width: auto; height: auto">
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">HNSW</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">图-based</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">高搜索效率需求</td>
</tr>
<tr style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(248, 248, 248, 1); width: auto; height: auto">
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">HNSW_SQ</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">量化-based</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">有限内存，次优精度</td>
</tr>
<tr style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); width: auto; height: auto">
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">SCANN</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">量化-based</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">高速度、高召回，大内存</td>
</tr>
<tr style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(248, 248, 248, 1); width: auto; height: auto">
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">BIN_FLAT</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">量化-based</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">二进制数据，小数据集，精确搜索</td>
</tr>
<tr style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); width: auto; height: auto">
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">SPARSE_INVERTED_INDEX</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">倒排索引</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">稀疏向量，文本搜索</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">相似性度量包括欧几里得距离（L2）、内积（IP）等，适用于浮点嵌入向量；对于二进制嵌入向量，支持汉明距离、Jaccard 距离等，特别适用于分子相似性搜索。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Milvus 还支持数据分区、分片、数据持久化、增量数据摄取、标量向量混合查询和时间旅行等高级功能。这些特性增强了其在生产环境中的灵活性和可靠性。</p>
<h2 style="align-items: center; background: none center / 63px no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: column; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 2.4em; letter-spacing: 0; border-radius: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: 38px; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: center; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 10px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">3. 向量数据库的概念与用例</span></h2>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">向量数据库是一种专门用于存储和检索高维向量的数据库，优化了向量相似性搜索。它们通过近似最近邻（ANN）算法高效地找到与查询向量最相似的向量。这种能力在处理非结构化数据时尤为重要，因为非结构化数据（如电子邮件、照片、蛋白质结构）可以通过嵌入技术转换为向量，从而进行相似性分析。</p>
<img src="https://files.mdnice.com/user/4969/c665ff58-f716-4c5d-8717-443b3c4ed556.png" alt="Milvus 架构图" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; border-radius: 8px; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 2px 4px 8px rgba(153, 153, 153, 1); border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); margin: 0 auto">Milvus 架构图
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">向量数据库结合了传统数据库的能力和独立向量索引的专门化，特别适合 AI 应用。Milvus 的典型应用场景包括：</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>图像相似性搜索：<a style="color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); font-weight: bold; border-radius: 0; text-decoration: none; text-decoration-thickness: initial; overflow-wrap: break-word; border-top: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); padding: 0; margin: 0" href="https://milvus.io/docs/tutorials-overview.md" rel="noopener nofollow">图像相似性搜索教程</a></li>
<li>视频相似性搜索：<a style="color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); font-weight: bold; border-radius: 0; text-decoration: none; text-decoration-thickness: initial; overflow-wrap: break-word; border-top: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); padding: 0; margin: 0" href="https://milvus.io/docs/tutorials-overview.md" rel="noopener nofollow">视频相似性搜索教程</a></li>
<li>推荐系统：<a style="color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); font-weight: bold; border-radius: 0; text-decoration: none; text-decoration-thickness: initial; overflow-wrap: break-word; border-top: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); padding: 0; margin: 0" href="https://milvus.io/docs/tutorials-overview.md" rel="noopener nofollow">推荐系统教程</a></li>
<li>问答系统：<a style="color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); font-weight: bold; border-radius: 0; text-decoration: none; text-decoration-thickness: initial; overflow-wrap: break-word; border-top: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); padding: 0; margin: 0" href="https://milvus.io/docs/tutorials-overview.md" rel="noopener nofollow">问答系统教程</a></li>
</ul>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">这些场景展示了 Milvus 在 AI 应用中的广泛适用性，尤其是在检索增强生成（RAG）、语义搜索和混合搜索中。</p>
<h2 style="align-items: center; background: none center / 63px no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: column; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 2.4em; letter-spacing: 0; border-radius: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: 38px; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: center; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 10px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">4. Milvus 的架构与底层原理</span></h2>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Milvus 采用共享存储架构，分离存储和计算，确保计算节点具有水平扩展能力，其四层架构如下：</p>
<table style="display: table; text-align: left">
<thead>
<tr><th style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(240, 240, 240, 1); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; min-width: 85px; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">层级</th><th style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(240, 240, 240, 1); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; min-width: 85px; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">功能描述</th></tr>
</thead>
<tbody style="font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal; border-image: initial; border: 0">
<tr style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); width: auto; height: auto">
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">接入层</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">由无状态代理组成，验证客户端请求，减少返回结果，使用负载均衡（如 Nginx、Kubernetes Ingress）。</td>
</tr>
<tr style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(248, 248, 248, 1); width: auto; height: auto">
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">协调服务</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">管理任务分配、集群拓扑、负载均衡、时间戳生成，包括 Root Coordinator、Query Coordinator、Data Coordinator。</td>
</tr>
<tr style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); width: auto; height: auto">
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">工作节点</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">执行 DML 命令，无状态，可在 Kubernetes 上扩展，包括查询节点、数据节点和索引节点。</td>
</tr>
<tr style="color: rgba(89, 89, 89, 1); background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(248, 248, 248, 1); width: auto; height: auto">
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">存储</td>
<td style="min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); padding: 5px 10px">负责数据持久化，包括元数据存储（etcd）、日志代理（Pulsar/RocksDB）、对象存储（MinIO、S3）。</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<img src="https://files.mdnice.com/user/4969/d3afc2e1-dcb6-45de-b606-bddd50698669.png" alt="多层架构设计" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; border-radius: 8px; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 2px 4px 8px rgba(153, 153, 153, 1); border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); margin: 0 auto">多层架构设计
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">4.1 数据处理流程</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Milvus 的数据处理包括：</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">数据插入</strong>：通过代理路由请求到分片，使用时间戳确保顺序，写入日志序列。</li>
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">索引构建</strong>：在索引节点上构建，支持 SIMD 加速，未来计划支持异构计算。</li>
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">数据查询</strong>：查询节点执行搜索，支持并发，分为增长段和密封段。</li>
</ul>
<img src="https://files.mdnice.com/user/4969/a8f8520b-2bc9-4f50-874b-3a0eb1cc5d5a.png" alt="写入路径中的流程图" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; border-radius: 8px; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 2px 4px 8px rgba(153, 153, 153, 1); border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); margin: 0 auto">写入路径中的流程图
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">4.2 索引机制</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Milvus 支持多种索引类型，每种索引有特定的参数和适用场景。例如，HNSW 索引适合高搜索效率，IVF_FLAT 适合平衡精度和速度。参数包括 <code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">nlist</code>、<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">M</code>、<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">efConstruction</code> 等，详情见https://milvus.io/docs/index.md。</p>
<img src="https://files.mdnice.com/user/4969/1d79bd16-5d70-4c29-988d-47b7bf3b0166.png" alt="倒排索引图" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; border-radius: 8px; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 2px 4px 8px rgba(153, 153, 153, 1); border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); margin: 0 auto"> 倒排索引图 <img src="https://files.mdnice.com/user/4969/13207a63-8dfc-44cb-b93e-6e92ef3d7331.png" alt="读取路径中的流程图" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; border-radius: 8px; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 2px 4px 8px rgba(153, 153, 153, 1); border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); margin: 0 auto">读取路径中的流程图
<h2 style="align-items: center; background: none center / 63px no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: column; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 2.4em; letter-spacing: 0; border-radius: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: 38px; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: center; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 10px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">5.Milvus 的高性能</span></h2>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">5.1 设计理念和架构优化</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Milvus 的高性能主要源于其独特的设计理念和架构优化：</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">云原生架构与计算存储分离</strong>：Milvus 采用云原生设计，将计算和存储分离，所有组件无状态，避免了资源竞争，提升了大规模数据处理能力。</li>
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">优化的向量索引算法</strong>：Milvus 支持多种高效的向量索引（如 HNSW、IVF_FLAT、SCANN），基于近似最近邻（ANN）算法，能在速度与精度间找到平衡，适合亿级甚至万亿级向量搜索。</li>
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">数据分区与并行处理</strong>：通过数据分区和分片，Milvus 将大数据集划分为小块，并行执行查询，显著降低延迟。</li>
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">高效查询处理</strong>：Milvus 针对向量搜索优化了查询机制，配备独立工作节点支持高并发，提升查询效率。</li>
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">硬件加速与扩展性</strong>：Milvus 充分利用现代硬件（如 GPU 加速）和分布式系统，通过 Kubernetes 等实现弹性扩展。</li>
</ul>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">总的来说，Milvus 的高性能得益于其云原生架构、先进的索引技术、分布式设计以及硬件优化，能够为现代 AI 应用提供低延迟和高吞吐量的支持。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">5.2 性能测试</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">下图是在 sift50m 数据集和 IVF_SQ8 索引上运行的测试结果，其中比较了不同nlist/nprobe 对的召回率和查询性能。</p>
<img src="https://files.mdnice.com/user/4969/e1fbb8fc-2bbf-4024-b3fa-e4f04e1f3f68.png" alt="准确性测试" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; border-radius: 8px; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 2px 4px 8px rgba(153, 153, 153, 1); border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); margin: 0 auto"> 准确性测试 <img src="https://files.mdnice.com/user/4969/608f88b2-42e7-4365-a949-2f0eb24f56d2.png" alt="性能测试" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; border-radius: 8px; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 2px 4px 8px rgba(153, 153, 153, 1); border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); margin: 0 auto">性能测试
<h2 style="align-items: center; background: none center / 63px no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: column; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 2.4em; letter-spacing: 0; border-radius: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: 38px; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: center; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 10px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">6. Semantic Kernel Vector Connectors 对 Milvus 的支持</span></h2>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">6.1 向量连接器</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Semantic Kernel Vector Connectors（简称“向量连接器”）是 Semantic Kernel 框架中的一类工具，专门设计用于将 Semantic Kernel 和向量数据库进行连接和管理。向量数据库是一种存储高维向量数据的系统，这些向量通常是文本、图像等数据的嵌入（embeddings），用于表示数据的语义特征。向量连接器作为桥梁，让 Semantic Kernel 可以高效地存取这些向量数据，支持复杂的 AI 功能。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">目前，Semantic Kernel 支持多种向量连接器，例如针对 Azure AI Search、Chroma、Milvus 和 Elasticsearch 等数据库的连接器，每种连接器都针对特定数据库优化，确保高效的数据操作。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">6.2 主要功能</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">向量连接器为开发者提供了以下关键功能：</p>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">6.2.1 数据存储与管理</span></h4>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">向量连接器允许将嵌入向量存储到向量数据库中，并支持插入、更新和删除操作。这些嵌入向量可以代表文本、图像等多种数据类型，帮助开发者轻松管理数据。</p>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">6.2.2 高效检索</span></h4>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">向量连接器支持快速的向量检索，例如通过近似最近邻（ANN）搜索，找到与查询向量最相似的向量。这一功能在语义搜索和推荐系统中尤为重要。</p>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">6.2.3 统一抽象</span></h4>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">向量连接器提供了一个统一的接口，隐藏了底层向量数据库的复杂性。开发者无需掌握每种数据库的具体实现细节即可使用，大大简化了开发过程。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">6.3 典型应用场景</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">向量连接器在以下场景中表现出色：</p>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">6.3.1 语义搜索</span></h4>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">在知识库或文档管理系统中，向量连接器可实现智能语义搜索。用户输入自然语言查询（如“查找关于预算的文档”），系统通过向量相似性返回相关结果。</p>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">6.3.2 推荐系统</span></h4>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">在电商或内容平台中，向量连接器可存储用户和物品的嵌入向量，通过计算相似度为用户推荐相关产品或内容。</p>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">6.3.3 知识图谱</span></h4>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">向量连接器可用于存储知识图谱中的实体嵌入向量，支持语义查询和推理，助力构建智能知识系统。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">6.3 代码演示</span></h3>
<blockquote class="custom-blockquote multiquote-1" style="border-radius: 8px; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(64, 184, 250, 0.1); width: auto; height: auto; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); display: block; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y: auto; border: 1px solid rgba(64, 184, 255, 0.4); padding: 10px 10px 10px 20px; margin: 20px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="display: block; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 0.5); font-size: 28px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: bold">❝</span>
<p style="text-indent: 0; color: rgba(59, 59, 59, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0">Microsoft.SemanticKernel.Connectors.Milvus 实现更强大的 AI 应用开发，但是这个包尚处于Alpha版本，接口随时可能会发生变化，大家现在只需要简单的看一下，等待最终版的发布就行了。以下代码由于该 <strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">Microsoft.SemanticKernel.Connectors.Milvus</strong> SDK 实现，此处只做Demo使用。</p>
</blockquote>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">6.3.1 MilvusMemoryStore</span></h4>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>&nbsp;
&nbsp;MilvusMemoryStore&nbsp;store&nbsp;=&nbsp;new(Host{},&nbsp;vectorSize:&nbsp;5,&nbsp;port:&nbsp;{Port},&nbsp;consistencyLevel:&nbsp;ConsistencyLevel.Strong);
&nbsp;</code></pre>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">6.3.2 创建集合</span></h4>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>await&nbsp;this.store.CreateCollectionAsync("collection1");</code></pre>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">6.3.3 插入数据</span></h4>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>&nbsp;this.store.UpsertBatchAsync(CollectionName,
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;new&nbsp;MemoryRecord(
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;new&nbsp;MemoryRecordMetadata(
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;isReference:&nbsp;true,
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;id:&nbsp;"Some&nbsp;id",
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;description:&nbsp;"Some&nbsp;description",
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;text:&nbsp;"Some&nbsp;text",
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;externalSourceName:&nbsp;"Some&nbsp;external&nbsp;resource&nbsp;name",
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;additionalMetadata:&nbsp;"Some&nbsp;additional&nbsp;metadata"),
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;new[]&nbsp;{&nbsp;10f,&nbsp;11f,&nbsp;12f,&nbsp;13f,&nbsp;14f&nbsp;},
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;key:&nbsp;"Some&nbsp;key",
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;timestamp:&nbsp;new&nbsp;DateTimeOffset(2023,&nbsp;1,&nbsp;1,&nbsp;12,&nbsp;0,&nbsp;0,&nbsp;TimeSpan.Zero)),
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;new&nbsp;MemoryRecord(
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;new&nbsp;MemoryRecordMetadata(
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;isReference:&nbsp;false,
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;id:&nbsp;"Some&nbsp;other&nbsp;id",
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;description:&nbsp;"",
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;text:&nbsp;"",
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;externalSourceName:&nbsp;"",
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;additionalMetadata:&nbsp;""),
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;new[]&nbsp;{&nbsp;20f,&nbsp;21f,&nbsp;22f,&nbsp;23f,&nbsp;24f&nbsp;},
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;key:&nbsp;null,
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;timestamp:&nbsp;null),
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;]);</code></pre>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">6.3.4 数据搜索</span></h4>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>List&lt;(MemoryRecord&nbsp;Record,&nbsp;double&nbsp;SimilarityScore)&gt;&nbsp;results&nbsp;=
&nbsp;&nbsp;this.Store.GetNearestMatchesAsync(CollectionName,&nbsp;new[]&nbsp;{&nbsp;5f,&nbsp;6f,&nbsp;7f,&nbsp;8f,&nbsp;9f&nbsp;},&nbsp;limit:&nbsp;2,&nbsp;withEmbeddings:&nbsp;withEmbeddings).ToEnumerable().ToList();
&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;Assert.True(result.Value.SimilarityScore&nbsp;&gt;&nbsp;0);
&nbsp;&nbsp;MemoryRecord&nbsp;record&nbsp;=&nbsp;result.Value.Record;

&nbsp;&nbsp;Assert.Equal("Some&nbsp;other&nbsp;id",&nbsp;record.Metadata.Id);
&nbsp;&nbsp;Assert.Equal(
&nbsp;&nbsp;withEmbeddings&nbsp;?&nbsp;[20f,&nbsp;21f,&nbsp;22f,&nbsp;23f,&nbsp;24f]&nbsp;:&nbsp;[],
&nbsp;&nbsp;record.Embedding.ToArray());</code></pre>
<hr style="border-radius: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: 1px; border-top: 2px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 10px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<h2 style="align-items: center; background: none center / 63px no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: column; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 2.4em; letter-spacing: 0; border-radius: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: 38px; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: center; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 10px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">7. 官方 SDK 安装与使用</span></h2>
<blockquote class="custom-blockquote multiquote-1" style="border-radius: 8px; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(64, 184, 250, 0.1); width: auto; height: auto; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); display: block; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y: auto; border: 1px solid rgba(64, 184, 255, 0.4); padding: 10px 10px 10px 20px; margin: 20px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="display: block; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 0.5); font-size: 28px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: bold">❝</span>
<p style="text-indent: 0; color: rgba(59, 59, 59, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0">此处只做简要演示，具体请看：<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/code-daily/p/18761132" rel="noopener" target="_blank">https://www.cnblogs.com/code-daily/p/18761132</a></p>
</blockquote>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">首先，通过 NuGet 安装 Milvus.Client 包。安装命令如下：</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>dotnet&nbsp;add&nbsp;package&nbsp;Milvus.Client</code></pre>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">安装完成后，可以通过以下步骤开始操作：</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">7.1 连接到 Milvus 服务器</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">使用 <code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">MilvusClient</code> 类创建客户端实例。例如：</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>var&nbsp;milvusClient&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;MilvusClient("localhost",&nbsp;username:&nbsp;"username",&nbsp;password:&nbsp;"password");</code></pre>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">请确保替换 "localhost" 为实际的 Milvus 服务主机地址。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">7.2 创建集合：</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">定义集合的 schema，包括字段类型和维度。例如，创建一个图书搜索的集合：</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>&nbsp;string&nbsp;collectionName&nbsp;=&nbsp;"book";
&nbsp;MilvusCollection&nbsp;collection&nbsp;=&nbsp;milvusClient.GetCollection(collectionName);

&nbsp;//Check&nbsp;if&nbsp;this&nbsp;collection&nbsp;exists
&nbsp;var&nbsp;hasCollection&nbsp;=&nbsp;await&nbsp;milvusClient.HasCollectionAsync(collectionName);

&nbsp;if(hasCollection){
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;await&nbsp;collection.DropAsync();
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Console.WriteLine("Drop&nbsp;collection&nbsp;{0}",collectionName);
&nbsp;}

&nbsp;await&nbsp;milvusClient.CreateCollectionAsync(
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;collectionName,
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;new[]&nbsp;{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;FieldSchema.Create&lt;long&gt;("book_id",&nbsp;isPrimaryKey:true),
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;FieldSchema.Create&lt;long&gt;("word_count"),
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;FieldSchema.CreateVarchar("book_name",&nbsp;256),
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;FieldSchema.CreateFloatVector("book_intro",&nbsp;2L)
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;);</code></pre>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">7.3 插入数据</span></h3>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>&nbsp;Random&nbsp;ran&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;();
&nbsp;List&lt;long&gt;&nbsp;bookIds&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;();
&nbsp;List&lt;long&gt;&nbsp;wordCounts&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;();
&nbsp;List&lt;ReadOnlyMemory&lt;float&gt;&gt;&nbsp;bookIntros&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;();
&nbsp;List&lt;string&gt;&nbsp;bookNames&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;();
&nbsp;for&nbsp;(long&nbsp;i&nbsp;=&nbsp;0L;&nbsp;i&nbsp;&lt;&nbsp;2000;&nbsp;++i)
&nbsp;{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bookIds.Add(i);
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;wordCounts.Add(i&nbsp;+&nbsp;10000);
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bookNames.Add($"Book&nbsp;Name&nbsp;{i}");

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;float[]&nbsp;vector&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;float[2];
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;for&nbsp;(int&nbsp;k&nbsp;=&nbsp;0;&nbsp;k&nbsp;&lt;&nbsp;2;&nbsp;++k)
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vector[k]&nbsp;=&nbsp;ran.Next();
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bookIntros.Add(vector);
&nbsp;}

&nbsp;MilvusCollection&nbsp;collection&nbsp;=&nbsp;milvusClient.GetCollection(collectionName);

&nbsp;MutationResult&nbsp;result&nbsp;=&nbsp;await&nbsp;collection.InsertAsync(
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;new&nbsp;FieldData[]
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;FieldData.Create("book_id",&nbsp;bookIds),
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;FieldData.Create("word_count",&nbsp;wordCounts),
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;FieldData.Create("book_name",&nbsp;bookNames),
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;FieldData.CreateFloatVector("book_intro",&nbsp;bookIntros),
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;});

&nbsp;//&nbsp;Check&nbsp;result
&nbsp;Console.WriteLine("Insert&nbsp;count:{0},",&nbsp;result.InsertCount);</code></pre>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">7.4 创建索引</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">为向量字段创建索引以加速搜索。例如：</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>
&nbsp;MilvusCollection&nbsp;collection&nbsp;=&nbsp;milvusClient.GetCollection(collectionName);
&nbsp;await&nbsp;collection.CreateIndexAsync(
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"book_intro",
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;//MilvusIndexType.IVF_FLAT,//Use&nbsp;MilvusIndexType.IVF_FLAT.
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IndexType.AutoIndex,//Use&nbsp;MilvusIndexType.AUTOINDEX&nbsp;when&nbsp;you&nbsp;are&nbsp;using&nbsp;zilliz&nbsp;cloud.
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SimilarityMetricType.L2);

&nbsp;//&nbsp;Check&nbsp;index&nbsp;status
&nbsp;IList&lt;MilvusIndexInfo&gt;&nbsp;indexInfos&nbsp;=&nbsp;await&nbsp;collection.DescribeIndexAsync("book_intro");

&nbsp;foreach(var&nbsp;info&nbsp;in&nbsp;indexInfos){
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Console.WriteLine("FieldName:{0},&nbsp;IndexName:{1},&nbsp;IndexId:{2}",&nbsp;info.FieldName&nbsp;,&nbsp;info.IndexName,info.IndexId);
&nbsp;}

&nbsp;//&nbsp;Then&nbsp;load&nbsp;it
&nbsp;await&nbsp;collection.LoadAsync();
&nbsp;}</code></pre>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">7.5 加载集合并执行搜索</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">加载集合后，可以执行向量搜索。例如，搜索与查询向量 [0.12217915, -0.034832448] 最相似的三部电影：</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>&nbsp;List&lt;string&gt;&nbsp;search_output_fields&nbsp;=&nbsp;new()&nbsp;{&nbsp;"book_id"&nbsp;};
&nbsp;List&lt;List&lt;float&gt;&gt;&nbsp;search_vectors&nbsp;=&nbsp;new()&nbsp;{&nbsp;new()&nbsp;{&nbsp;0.1f,&nbsp;0.2f&nbsp;}&nbsp;};
&nbsp;SearchResults&nbsp;searchResult&nbsp;=&nbsp;await&nbsp;collection.SearchAsync(
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"book_intro",
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;new&nbsp;ReadOnlyMemory&lt;float&gt;[]&nbsp;{&nbsp;new[]&nbsp;{&nbsp;0.1f,&nbsp;0.2f&nbsp;}&nbsp;},
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SimilarityMetricType.L2,
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;limit:&nbsp;2);

&nbsp;//&nbsp;Query
&nbsp;string&nbsp;expr&nbsp;=&nbsp;"book_id&nbsp;in&nbsp;[2,4,6,8]";

&nbsp;QueryParameters&nbsp;queryParameters&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;();
&nbsp;queryParameters.OutputFields.Add("book_id");
&nbsp;queryParameters.OutputFields.Add("word_count");

&nbsp;IReadOnlyList&lt;FieldData&gt;&nbsp;queryResult&nbsp;=&nbsp;await&nbsp;collection.QueryAsync(
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;expr,
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;queryParameters);</code></pre>
<img src="https://files.mdnice.com/user/4969/4aadcaa2-ddce-401a-bae1-3f9d1f638712.png" alt="" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; border-radius: 8px; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 2px 4px 8px rgba(153, 153, 153, 1); border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); margin: 0 auto">
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">这些操作展示了 Milvus 在 .NET 环境下的基本使用方法，开发者可以根据实际需求调整参数和数据。</p>
<h2 style="align-items: center; background: none center / 63px no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: column; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 2.4em; letter-spacing: 0; border-radius: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: 38px; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: center; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 10px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">8. 结语</span></h2>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Milvus 是一个功能强大的向量数据库，特别适合需要高效向量相似性搜索的 AI 和 ML 应用。在 .NET 环境中，通过 Milvus C# SDK 或者 Semantic Milvus Connector，开发者可以轻松实现数据存储、索引和检索等操作。建议读者参考官方文档和社区资源进一步探索，例如 <a style="color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); font-weight: bold; border-radius: 0; text-decoration: none; text-decoration-thickness: initial; overflow-wrap: break-word; border-top: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); padding: 0; margin: 0" href="https://milvus.io/docs" rel="noopener nofollow">Milvus 官方文档</a> 和 <a style="color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); font-weight: bold; border-radius: 0; text-decoration: none; text-decoration-thickness: initial; overflow-wrap: break-word; border-top: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); padding: 0; margin: 0" href="https://github.com/milvus-io/milvus-sdk-csharp" rel="noopener nofollow">Milvus C# SDK GitHub</a>。</p>
<hr style="border-radius: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: 1px; border-top: 2px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 10px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<h2 style="align-items: center; background: none center / 63px no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: column; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 2.4em; letter-spacing: 0; border-radius: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: 38px; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: center; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 10px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">9.引用</span></h2>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>Milvus 官方文档概述：https://milvus.io/docs/overview.md</li>
<li>Milvus C# SDK GitHub 仓库：https://github.com/milvus-io/milvus-sdk-csharp)</li>
<li>Milvus 连接器 NuGet 包：https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.SemanticKernel.Connectors.Milvus)</li>
<li>MilvusMemoryStoreTests：https://github.com/microsoft/semantic-kernel/blob/main/dotnet/src/IntegrationTests/Connectors/Memory/Milvus/MilvusMemoryStoreTests.cs</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div id="MySignature" role="contentinfo">
